comments.content:
The only way to communicate between osmdroid developers seems to be this issue tracker. Can we start a mailing list?
I can do it if you like but maybe someone with prior involvement prefers to be the owner.

Regards
Anders
http://code.google.com/p/geohunter/

The mailing list is created:
http://groups.google.com/group/osmdroid

Everyone is invited to join.
